tool_description: An API showing all the latest Climate Change News
name: climatechange2api
title: climatechange2api

api_list.name: Get Individual News Sources
api_list.description: Get News about Climate Change from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climatechange2api.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatechange2api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climatechange2api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatechange2api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return news about climate change from all over the world
api_list.code:
